Sentencas: Biomass gasification can be efficiently integrated with Solid Oxide Fuel Cells (SOFCs) to properly deploy the energy content of this renewable source and increasing the ratio of electric to thermal converted energy.
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance

Sentencas: The key objective of this work is to analyze in a systematic and wide process the integration of a biomass gasifier process with the SOFC operation.
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance

Sentencas: In particular the work aims at identifying the role of SOFC H-2 utilization as a basic parameter to maximize the system output and avoid gasifier bad operation issues such as tar production and carbon deposition.
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance

Sentencas: An efficient simulation framework is used to that purpose allowing for a detailed analysis of the influence of key driving parameters.
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance

Sentencas: The performance of the integrated system is thoroughly analyzed in the range of 1-2 kW electric power by also varying the input biomass characteristics in terms of Moisture Content (MC).
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance

Sentencas: Results show how a variation of the SOFC H-2 utilization, a parameter whose effects are also correlated with the gasifier air requirement, affects electrical power output also depending on the biomass Moisture Content.
Titulo: Biomass fueling of a SOFC by integrated gasifier: Study of the effect of operating conditions on system performance
